alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:03PM CDT until August 07 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT/645 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHEYENNE...NORTHWESTERN THOMAS... SOUTHWESTERN RAWLINS AND NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 502 PM MDT/602 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of McDonald, or 18 miles north of Brewster, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Cheyenne, northwestern Thomas, southwestern Rawlins and northeastern Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
